synthesis_conditions.amount_of_solvent: Four DCE molecules per formula unit
synthesis_conditions.equipment: Single-crystal structure analysis equipment, in situ powder X-ray diffraction (PXRD) measurements equipment
synthesis_conditions.time: 24 h for exposure to DCE vapor
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: Evacuation at 298 K produces a partially desolvated species 1-nDCE
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Crystallizes in the triclinic P(1) space group. The oxidation state of each D/A unit was determined by comparing local bond lengths in the [Ru2] and TCNQ(OMe)2 moieties.

synthesis_conditions.temperature: 298 K for partial desolvation from 1-4DCE, 353 K for further evacuation to produce 1
synthesis_conditions.equipment: Single-crystal structure analysis equipment, in situ powder X-ray diffraction (PXRD) measurements equipment
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: Evacuation at 353 K to remove all DCE, yielding 1
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Crystallizes in the triclinic P(1) space group. Characteristic differences in packing were found in the formation of inter-layer π–π stacks between m-FPhCO2@ ligands.

synthesis_conditions.equipment: Single-crystal structure analysis equipment, in situ powder X-ray diffraction (PXRD) measurements equipment
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: Evacuation at 353 K to remove all DCE
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Crystallizes in the triclinic P(1) space group. Isostructural features to 1-0.4DCE.

synthesis_conditions.temperature: 298 K for exposure to DCE vapor for 24 h
synthesis_conditions.equipment: Single-crystal X-ray diffraction (SCXRD) analysis equipment, PXRD analyses equipment
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Essentially the same as 1-0.4DCE, transiently found in the desolvation process of 1-4DCE.
